page.title: Catalyst - Project Funding
page.caption: Catalyst brings on-chain governance to the Cardano blockchain by allowing the community to self-determine priorities for growth.

ideascale.caption: Browse Proposals
ideascale.text:
Catalyst uses IdeaScale as a collaborative innovation platform. This is done through voting on 
community generated proposals which focus on solving the challenge of a particular fund.

newsletter.caption: Keep up to date
newsletter.text: Sign up for the Project Catalyst Newsletter to not miss out on the latest news and updates.

engage.caption: Engage the community
engage.text:
Join the Telegram discussion and announcement channels to share your ideas on future Cardano 
improvement proposals and enjoy a healthy, stimulating discussion.

townhall.caption: Meet the builders
townhall.text: Come and meet the future builders of Cardano in the weekly Town Hall meetings. Watch their live presentations and participate in meaningful conversations.

timeline.caption: Timeline shown below are subject to changes. Stay up-to-date by re-visiting this page and participate in the Catalyst weekly town hall meetings.

app.caption: In order to participate and vote in the Catalyst funds, first you have to download the Catalyst mobile application to your phone.

notice.label: Please "note":
notice.text:
DON"T scan these QR codes in the Catalyst mobile app!
QR code link to the store where you can download and install the Catalyst mobile app.

pin.caption: This PIN will be required every time you use the Catalyst voting application on your phone.
pin.warning:
Make sure to write it down!
Losing this PIN will require a new voting key registration!
pin.confirm: Input PIN a second time to confirm.
pin.confirmWarningError: Please confirm that you have written down the PIN in a secure place.

tx.caption: Click on Register to construct a transaction that connects the generated Catalyst voting key to this wallet.
tx.caption1: The higher amount of funds the wallet holds, the more voting power it disposes with. \nPlease review the transaction before signing. Enter the wallet spending password or sign with \nthe hardware device to confirm the transaction.
tx.warning:
Make sure to keep your account balance above 25 Ada at the voting power snapshot event, 
otherwise your voting key registration would be dismissed.

error.network: Unsupported network for Catalyst vote registration.
error.save: Failed to save voting key to wallet storage. Please contact support for further assistance!
error.catalystkey: Catalyst voting key missing. This shouldn"t happen, please contact support!
error.api: Unable to query voting API, please reload or contact support if recurring.
error.funds: At least ###min_ada_catalyst### is required for the wallet to be eligible to participate in voting.
error.rewards: Your ###rewards_amount### rewards can not be used in voting unless you withdraw them to your wallet.
error.notregistered: The wallet is not registered, please first delegate to a stake pool in order to participate in Catalyst voting.
error.nometadata: Unknown error, registration metadata not correctly generated, please retry or contact support if recurring.

registerForNextFund.label: Please note
registerForNextFund.caption: Currently, registration is open for fund 10 of Catalyst. After this event, voting on future funds will be handled differently. Join the Catalyst communities to learn more.
